document_data.mainbody:
The Ziggurat of Eternal Victory was a massive pyramid temple dedicated to Gilgeam, the Supreme Ruler of Unther.
The temple was located in the Palace District of the capital city of Unthalass.
The Ziggurat of Eternal Victory a step pyramid with sixteen tiers. The entire surface of the pyramid was covered in gold, bronze, and other metals and the top was crowned with blue brickwork. The temple stood  tall, making it one of the largest man-made structures throughout Faerûn.
Much of the Ziggurat of Eternal Victory was sacked and burned following Gilgeams death in the mid–14 century DR.
